name: Dogfight '99
description:
Dogfight '99 is a tiny, simple, shmup designed for the Game Boy.

Pilot your craft through 99 waves of enemy barrage to save the universe and claim the high score!

Notice the images that highlight the hit boxes for your craft and the enemy ships!

You'll have to aim carefully, but you've got more room to maneuver your own ship than you may think.

SCORING

Enemy Hit+ 21 pts
Enemy Destroyed+ 100 ptsSingle Shot Fired- 1 ptDouble Shot Fired- 2 pts
  • Waves in this demo version consist of a single enemy ship with randomized flight pattern.
  • Thanks and credit to Valdezv666 for the music in this demo.
  • Feel free to report any bugs or suggestions in the comments.

Download the ROM below!
